name: AH-64D Longbow
summary: AH-64D Longbow is a realistic combat flight simulator of the AH-64D Apache Longbow attack helicopter. Released on June 3, 1996, for the PC, this simulation was developed at Origin Systems. AH-64D Longbow was the second simulator released under the Jane's Combat Simulators line from Electronic Arts.

name: A Hat in Time
summary: A Hat in Time is a cute-as-heck 3D platformer featuring a little girl who stitches hats for wicked powers! Freely explore giant worlds and recover Time Pieces to travel to new heights!

name: Ahriman's Prophecy
summary:
Amaranth Games introduces Ahriman’s Prophecy, a beautiful fantasy world doomed to be destroyed by the demon, Ahriman.

In a desperate attempt to stop the prophecy, the Daughters of Light send you, a young but powerful magic wielder, on a difficult quest to unlock the secrets of the prophecy and hopefully, learn how to stop it.

If you enjoy classic RPGs like Final Fantasy 6 and Chrono Trigger, you’re going to love Ahriman’s Prophecy.

name: Ah Diddums
summary: In this classic ZX Spectrum game from 1983, take on the role of the loyal Teddy, trying to leave the toybox to comfort a crying baby. But watch out! The other toys, scared that the baby being comforted will lead to mother turning out the lights, will try to stop you!

name: A House of Many Doors
summary:
“Between the infinite worlds was infinite nothing. A void, a darkness between realities. But nothing is as crowded as is nothing. The House built itself in reaction to its own lack of existence.”

A House of Many Doors is an indie RPG written and coded by Harry Tuffs, with art by Catherine Unger and music by Zach Beever.

In A House of Many Doors you are an explorer, poet and spy, traversing and mapping the House – a vast parasite dimension that steals things and people from other worlds.

Exploring in a train that scuttles on mechanical legs, you will discover bizarre civilizations, befriend your crew, write procedurally-generated poetry, and cling to life and sanity.

name: Ahnayro: The Dream World
summary:
Ahnayro is a historically focused, narrative driven puzzle game exploring the world of dreams. You play as a person gifted with the ability to look beyond the veil of reality, investigating a universe that opens up to you every night; haunting you, beckoning you to solve the mysteries within.

Yet you are not in control of this world; you are at the mercy of mysterious individuals, who flow in and out of your mind. Your only hope of gaining control over this world is to piece together your fragmented visions and confront your tormentors.

As any dream, however, this new reality is structured on the waking world, and understanding one necessitates understanding the other.

The dream world reveals itself in fragments. It is up to you to piece together information and discover the hidden meaning behind them. Through a series of research and logic-based puzzles which challenge your knowledge of real world historical events, figures, art and mythology, you will slowly uncover the identities of those who speak to you in your dreams.

name: A Haunting: Witching Hour
summary:
A Haunting : Witching Hour is a storytelling Virtual Reality game of dark horror and desperate survival. An immersive experience finds players discovering – and taking part in – a rich story that explores the dark corners of human nature. It will unfold in episodes, giving players the opportunity to continue to unravel a complex mystery through downloadable content that picks up where the previous episode’s cliffhanger left off.

It is scheduled for release on both PC and console platforms.

Episode One follows an indie film crew who travels to Shady Hollow to produce a documentary on John Beaumont and the disappearance of the 2 miners. In 1975 John was accused and convicted of murdering two coal miners. During the investigation, John claimed it was the Hollow Creek Witch responsible for the disappearance of the miners.

Players take on the role of Eddie, a character with a checkered past who has psychic abilities that allows him to see things from the past while touching items found throughout the game. The game will start off with Eddie being found along a lonely road by police. The police bring Eddie in for questioning in regards to the whereabouts of the remaining film makers. As Eddie tells his story, players are taken to that point in the story and play through what happened at that point.

name: A Hand in the Darkness
summary:
Follow Alex in his new stage in life at the prestigious all-male boarding school St.Michaels. He will meet new friends, but soon he will also find out his life is in danger! Will he survive his school year? Will he find true love? It's all up to you!
Enjoy this Boys Love's Edwardian drama featuring three love interests, with three endings each one: a good one, a bad one and a bad relationship one.

name: A Hole New World
summary: The city is being invaded by monsters from the Upside Down World! You, the Potion Master, must defeat evil all alone, with no tutorials or "Easy Mode" to assist you. You'll have to rely on the help of Fäy, your companion fairy, and your potions!

name: Ahros: One Warrior Chronicle
summary: Ahros: One Warrior Chronicle is an adventure VR-game where you shoot big guns, fly dragons and do many other things while restoring peace and order in a world destroyed by global war.

name: A Healer Only Lives Twice
summary:
All You Need Is Heal!
Monsters have cornered you in the dungeon corridors.
As a newly hired Priest, your duties are to use your magical abilities to
heal your comrade, a Knight on the front-line, and provide support during battle.
Will these two brave souls live to see the light of day again?

A version of the game was launched on PlayStation Vita in 2015 and on PC a couple months later. Though only released in Japan at the time, both had an English text option in-game.
The PlayStation Vita version was delisted when PlayStation Mobile shutdown.

name: Ah Eikou No Koushien
summary: Ah Eikou no Koushien is an arcade baseball game which is played under normal baseball rules with the exception being that players can charge themselves up to attempt a better hit or pitch.

name: AHTS Ship Simulator
summary: Captain, command a 3000 ton anchor handling and tug supply (AHTS) vessel and navigate it in high seas to a nearby oil rig. You control it with powerful main engines and side thrusters. Two outside water cannons help against a UFO with a tractor beam and fires that make your mission difficult. Set your weather and make sure not to collide with traffic or the rig. Have fun, Captain

name: AH-64D Longbow Gold
summary:
AH-64D Longbow Longbow Gold Edition was released in April 1997.

It is a compilation pack featuring the AH-64D Longbow and Flash Point: Korea add-ons. It was also fully patched and updated to include a Windows executable, so DOS is no longer necessary. Also included the 3Dfx update, which adds a Glide renderer.

name: Aha! I Got It! Escape Game
summary:
Use your head and solve the puzzles to escape the room Milo is in! Enjoy alone or with the help of family and friends!
Use your head and solve the puzzles to escape the room Milo is in! Play alone or with family and friends to solve this puzzling adventure game! Today is Milo’s birthday and he gets an amazing present from his dad...a room of puzzles that he likes to solve. Milo needs to solve all the puzzles to escape from the room. So use the Wii Remote controller and SHAKE!! PUSH!! TWIST!! to interact with, collect, and use items you find in the game. There is plenty to solve using all of the Wii Remote controller’s tricks and treats. See if you have what it takes to figure it all out.

name: Aha! I Found It! Hidden Object Game
summary:
A hidden object game for everyone! Do your best and quickly find items among a crowd of objects onscreen.
A hidden object game for everyone has come to the WiiWare service! Do your best and try to find 12 particular items among a crowd of objects onscreen as fast as you can! From big fish to tiny earrings. Easy to find items to very well hidden items. Lots of items and lots of fun can be found in this hidden object game! Unlike most other hidden object games, play along with friends and family and compete to see who best at finding the hidden objects in each stage! (Up to 4 players) With 10 stages in total and over 277 different items, there is plenty of searching fun to enjoy! Also, with many items changing position each time you play, you can enjoy each stage again and again! Play and enjoy together!

name: A Hole New World: Deluxe Edition
summary:
This edition includes:

- A Hole New World base game.
- A Hole New World Soundtrack.

name: A Harvesting Moon
summary:
A text adventure that was later re-released with some added graphics.

The game was created using Gilsoft's Quill. You tell the game what you want to do by typing instructions via keyboard and the parser is based on verb / noun input.

name: AH-64 Apache Air Assault
summary:
In July 2001 it was discovered that an terrorist organization known as the "The Solar Martyrs", hiding in a small country called Banhar, may have nuclear weapons at their disposal. The U.S. government decided that a large-scale attack would prove risky, and so a small group of Special Forces was formed...

"Only one machine is fit for such a task..."

In this simulator the player controls an AH-64 Apache, the "primary attack helicopter in the U.S. Arsenal". It can be controlled from 5 different points of view, including 1st (inside the cockpit) and 3rd person ones. The on screen display holds valuable information to the pilot, such as damage meters, status of engines, rotor brakes, wheel brakes and hover, air speed, altitude, compass, radar, RPM, Torque, Fuel and more.

The game features two control systems: arcade and physics mode. In arcade mode the helicopter maintains altitude while flying forward, while the physics mode is based on real world physics, thus, when the helicopter is moving forward, it will also lose altitude if the motor power isn't increased. The helicopter can be controlled either with a keyboard/mouse combo or with a joystick.

The AH-64 comes equipped with 3 different types of weapons: Hellfire Missiles, m230 Chain Gun 30mm Automatic Cannon and Hydra Rockets. There is also a fourth kind of weapon, the Zuni Rockets, only available later in the game. Hellfire missiles are target lockable and the Cannon can be aimed with the mouse.

There are 30 unique missions in this game; in most of them the player must accomplish several objectives, usually destroying enemy buildings and vehicles. The game can be saved at the end of each mission, but not during them. If the player gets killed during a mission, he must start it all over again, but the number of tries is unlimited.

name: A House in California
summary: ‘A House in California’ is a surreal, narrative game about four characters who bring a house to life. These four characters are based on relatives of mine (two grandmothers and two great-grandmothers). The game is inspired aesthetically by Mystery House, developed in 1980 by Roberta & Ken Williams. But whereas Mystery House is a mystery story about greed and murder, A House in California is more like an Imagist poem about family and memory.

name: AHx-1
summary: An authentic simulation of one of the world's most versatile and deadly attack helicopters, AHx-1 puts players behind the wheel of an AHx-1 Viper. The game offers 45 simulated combat missions and thirty life-like scenarios to tackle that take place in exotic enemy territory such as Columbia and Libya. Authenticity is the focus of this game designed by ex-Israeli fighter pilots to mimic actual combat.

name: AH-64D Longbow: Flash Point Korea
summary: Flash Point Korea is an expansion pack (mission disc) for AH-64D Longbow featuring combat in Korea.

name: Ahlgrens Bilspelet
summary: Ahlgrens Bilspelet is based on the most popular marshmallow cars in Sweden.

name: A housewife Hiroko Yamaguchi is reborn in the alternative world with her husband
summary: A role-playing game from TKHsoft.

name: A Handful of Keflings
summary: The Keflings need your help! Visit a magical realm and lend the tiny Keflings a hand. Start by building a single home and work towards creating a thriving bastion of culture sure to be the envy of cultural bastions everywhere! Put the cheerful Keflings to work harvesting and refining resources while you unlock the blueprints and building pieces used to make buildings like a lumber mill or Magic Mark's Mutton Masseuse. Do it all in this friendly, laid-back city building game with heart.

name: Ah! Heaven
summary: Ah! Heaven, is a platform game developed with an Eastern ink painting style.

name: A Hoy Pirates Adventure
summary:
Welcome to Pirates Adventure, this arcade style game is fun, addictive, and very challenging. 
 
You're a pirate and your goal is to collect gold from different islands. Games includes 100 uniq levels. 
 
Collect all the gold coins to finish a level. Use sword to kill your enemies. Ah and don't touch those traps!

name: Aha Link Color: Cross
summary: Connect matching colors node. Pair all nodes and cover the entire board, use the "Cross cell" to let two link in same space to solve each level.

name: Ahlman Arcade 2018
summary: Ahlman Arcade 2018 is a collection of games made by the game industry students at Ahlman Institute.All games were made during our ten month long school year as a joint effort between the programmers and graphic designers. The time spent developing each game varied, with some being made in a week or so and others taking over ten weeks to develop.Our games have a diverse selection of different genres, ranging from colorful platformers and collect-a-thons to sport games, horror mysteries, racing games and bullet hell manias.They can be found on the consoles and cabinets scattered about inside the Ahlman Arcade itself, so try to find and play them all!

name: A Hat in Time: Seal the Deal
summary: Seal the Deal introduces an all-new chapter: The Arctic Cruise, and an all-new incredibly difficult mode: Death Wish!

name: Ah, Love!
summary: A new love puzzle help you relax after hard day. Beautiful music, many levels, amazing atmosphere!

name: Ahegal
summary: You are the last man alive on the planet. Meet and UNDRESS BEAUTIFUL GIRLS to save humanity. Find that special spot to make women AHEGAO. Master your lover skills and girls will adore you. But be careful where you touch - You might end up with a broken heart, handsome!

name: A Hat in Time: Nyakuza Metro
summary: Welcome to the deep underground Nyakuza Metro! It's the perfect place for a little lying, a little cheating... a little stealing. Join the Nyakuza and become mad rich - joining a gang never turned out bad, right?

name: A Hand With Many Fingers
summary: A Hand With Many Fingers is a first-person investigation game about a real Cold War conspiracy. Explore the CIA's murky history of drug smuggling, regime change, and assassination.

name: A Host of Gentle Terrors
summary:
A Host of Gentle Terrors throws you into a constantly shifting world filled with strange inhabitants. You'll discover monstrosity, isolation, and possibly even connection in this text-based game's often surreal and unsettling fantasy landscape. You might call it a queer procedurally generated open world weird fantasy roguelike walking simulator... but you probably couldn't do it very seriously. 
 
Remember your journey, a journey that will always be uniquely your own... 
 
This Cool Walking Simulator Features: 
No Leveling 
No Crafting System 
Bullets! (but no guns to shoot them with) 
No Stamina Meters 
No Retro Pixel Art 
One Zombie 
Non-Euclidean Geography 
Uncomfortably Biological Machinery 
Abandoned Places 
Loads of Strange Things Animal, Vegetable, and Mineral 
A Fishing Mini Game Everyone Loves Fishing Mini Games Right? 
Tyranny And Mutation (The Concepts, Not The Album) 
Queer Shit I Mean It's A Twine Game What Honestly Did You Expect 
NEW: Autosaving!

name: A Heart between Parts
summary:
A Heart between Parts is a classic Point and Click adventure game made for LUDUM DARE #33 gamejam with the theme You are the Monster. You take on the role of a "scientific" experiment, a monster, made to be loved but hated by its own creator.

You have to escape the room he locked you in.

name: A Hero and a Garden
summary: Play as a fairytale hero and help him garden, since saving the princess didn't go that well. A fantasy gardening visual novel and clicker game.

name: A House of Thieves
summary: A House of Thieves is a level-based stealth comedy-horror game about a Thief who doesn't go shopping but instead takes his shopping list and breaks into random houses to get his things.

name: A Hat on Time
summary: Grab all 30 time pieces in this short platformer, based on the game A Hat in Time!

name: Ahlman Mansion 2020
summary: Ahlman Mansion 2020 is a huge collection of games made by the Game Industry students at Ahlman Institute. Some content was created by Literature, Music and Art students. All games were made during our 10 month long school. The game developments ranged from 1 week to 2 and one took 5 weeks.

name: Ahoy
summary: First person multiplayer action/adventure game set during the Age of Sail. Providing an authentic interactive experience of the 18th century Caribbean through sailing, combat, trade and social mechanics.

name: AH-3: ThunderStrike
summary: AH-3 Thunderstrike is a helicopter sim/shooter. You will pilot the AH-3 over 10 operations all over the world. Each operation is composed of several missions, such as destroying tanks, or destroying bridges, or escorting trucks, and so on.

name: A Hermit Crab is Finding a House
summary: Play as an adorable hermit crab, solve the shell puzzle on the beach and find the perfect house. The key to solve the puzzles is to stack shells cleverly and plan the order and direction of entry or exit.

name: AHH!!! MazeZing
summary: A first person maze game.

name: Ahead
summary: Playing as a light cube, you're falling short on energy and you need to collect energy prisms to get your power back to escape the darkness. The more prisms you get, the stronger your light will become, but can you survive until you pick enough ?

name: Ahri and Bear
summary: Ahri and Bear is a 3D puzzle adventure game, where players will take control of Ahri the cat and Bear the dog who embark on an emotional journey together to find their true home. Use Ahri and Bear's unique abilities to navigate through the daunting human world so they can find their way back home.

name: A Hole In Space
summary: A "small" universe simulation, where you play as a black hole and try to absorb the whole universe. You decide the size and shape of the universe. Could also be used as a less meaningful CPU benchmark.

name: Ah-Hoy!
summary: Visual Novel in which you can interact with a chaotic crew of pirates! This is my first ever attempt at a visual novel / dating sim, so it is definitely a learning experience with lots of trial and error! I'm hoping for some solid feedback on what I have so far. This is only a snippet of what I have plan, and hope to have stories for each character in which you can choose from.

name: Ah!! My Roommate is a Succubus Hellbent on World Conquest!!
summary: Your demons follow you wherever you go...

name: A Hideo Kojima Game
summary: Not actually a Hideo Kojima game

name: A Horrible Evil Spider Head Love Story
summary: Date a Horrible Evil Spider Head... thing. Is he...it?... the one?

name: A Hunter's Day
summary: Play one day in the life of a hunter.

name: A Hole to Another Place SCP-1437
summary: Short Experience with SCP-1437

name: A Hero's Guide to Gardening
summary: Interactive narrative game about emotional literacy and mental health

name: A Human Haunting!
summary: A hidden object game where a ghost looks for signs of a human haunting!

name: A Holiday Yarn
summary: more of a cross-stitch, really

name: A Handful of Recurring Dreams
summary: A small zine about the things we do while we sleep

name: A Hexagon's Adventures
summary: Move by the dice roll and battle enemies through the power of typing to advance through your adventure.

name: Ahmmit's Gate
summary: A reverse-horror game where you play as a blind monster that survives off the fear of humans.

name: Ahro
summary: Ahro is an atmospheric side-scrolling adventure game set in an intriguing world of exploration and lore. Out now on Nintendo Switch and Steam!

name: AH3AD: Retrowave Runner
summary: AH3AD: Retrowave Runner is a 2D platformer game with a mix of runner and puzzle genres. Reshape the levels using the power of color-switching. Quick thinking and perseverance will be key to achieve victory.

name: A Highland Song
summary: Enter the Highlands. Lose yourself. Find harmony. Reach the sea. A narrative adventure with rhythm and survival elements, from the creators of Heaven’s Vault and 80 Days.

name: A Hat in Time: Vanessa's Curse
summary: A deadly game of tag in Queen Vanessa's Manor! Escape the clutches of your fallen peers.

name: Ahhnalog 112
summary: Put yourself in Takashi's shoes and find out what's going on, help him decide at key moments and discover the 11 different endings of this science fiction story with some notes of erotic humor.

name: A Housewife's Healing Touch
summary: A Housewife's Healing Touch was directed and developed by Alicesoft's Furin, creator of Oyako Rankan, Heartful Mama, Haha Ranman, the Tsuma series and famous for his dedication to the depiction of alluring, mature women. It's a narrative-driven adventure game set in a fantasy world, starring a motherly, bewitching married woman.

name: A Hell of a Journey
summary: Experience a great journey with famous poet Dante and his super "reliable" narrator Virgil.

name: Ahmes
summary: In Ancient Egypt, Ahmes and his little brother Akil are orphans and live a simple life. Until one day, the Royal Guards come and attack their village. Akil is thrown into the Nil river. Ahmes rushes to save his brother, but a giant hand emerges from the water and carries Akil into the darkness of the Nil. Ahmes then enters the Underworld in order to save his little brother.

name: A Haunted History
summary: A Haunted History is a survival horror game that focuses mainly on the story. Discover everything by exploring the ambiance, finding clues and solving puzzles, and also experiencing some lil' bit... weird situations.

name: Ahegal Seasons
summary: You are the last man alive on the planet. Meet and undress beautiful women to save humanity. Find that special spot to make women ahegal. Master your lover skills and ladies will adore you. But be careful where you touch - You might end up with a broken heart, handsome!

name: A Hero's Rest: An RPG Town Simulator
summary: Build shops, craft items with hundreds of customization options, and manage your resources wisely to lead your Heroes to success. Immerse yourself as proprietor of a medieval fantasy town in a world abounding with Heroes and Monsters.

name: A Hero's Quest pt1
summary: A Hero's Quest pt 1 Fulfill the role of a Hero and join this cast of misfits in stopping evil and saving the world, but what will happen to them. Will they save the world or will they be stopped?

name: A Hero's wish
summary: You will be the heroine and have a mission to defeat the devil. You will encounter many people and monsters on your way to the devil. Depending on your choice, someone will be an enemy and someone will be allies. Check now for the ending you will reach with your choice.

name: AHOD: All Hands on Deck!
summary: Build the strongest sailing crew and defeat your opponents in AHOD: All Hands on Deck! This fast-paced deckbuilder game features exciting card gameplay, strategic deck composition, and a variety of powerful weapons and magical loot.

name: A Halloween Valentine
summary: A Halloween Valentine is a puzzle-adventure pop album set in a haunted amusement park on Valentine's Day.

name: A Hundred Kinds of Your Smile
summary: A fun and causal girl's love RPG game, with some puzzles to solve. An adventure to save the lover through many parallel worlds.

name: A Happy Valentine
summary: A side story that takes place after 40 Days and 40 Nights of Rain. It's a special day, and Kyrie is trying to celebrate this special day for Yuu.

name: A Heart of Butterblue
summary: It is under these circumstances that Phebe finds herself moving to the isolated frontier town of Edgeville. Rumors have it that monsters roam the lands after dark and anyone caught outside is never heard from again. With eerie murderous howling heard every night, Phebe has no choice to become accustomed to this new life if she wants to find her missing grandfather.

name: A Hat in Time: Deluxe Edition
A Hat in Time: Ultimate Edition
summary: A Hat in Time: Ultimate Edition contains A Hat in Time and its two DLCs, Seal the Deal and Nyakuza Metro.

name: A Hint of Purple
summary: A short visual novel about queer love and art. Follow Maya, a once-celebrated painter now paralyzed, as she struggles to accept her new reality and its effects on her relationship. Argue with your Prefrontal Cortex, insult an art critic, befriend the elderly.

name: A Hero's Journey
summary: The story of the prince and the dragon is a common RPG story type. In the real world, aren't we also in the process of hunting the dragon and then gradually realizing the operating rules of the world around us? Therefore, this game slightly adapts the story and aims to explore the relationship between life and the world, especially in the context of Chinese-style education.

name: A Heroine Story
summary: When a wizard comes to the village to help Victoria against a magical entity, things take a turn for the unexpected and the young mayor will have to make a decision that will change her life forever.

name: A Hell of a Soup
summary: In this Open World Adventure FPS, your mum sends you on a journey through the desolated lands because she's in desperate need of ingredients for her soup.

name: A Hero's Legacy
summary: Lenz is a kind and charismatic young man who will embark on this fantasy journey in a vast world, full of incredible adventures to explore, and several secrets to uncover!

name: A Horse Named Quake
summary: Small vertical medieval courtyard with a built-in skill selection room. The map source is included.

name: Ahorcado 3D: Hangedman 3D
summary: El tradicional juego del ahorcado ahora en 3D. The traditional hangman game now in 3D.

name: Ah Nanjarin
summary: Strange creature "Nanjarin" enjoy the game Ikusei Simulation foster growth. Living together, Teru Iku Nanjarin if you are changing in different shapes, babies, children, there are 22 different kinds of characters and all the adults together. Nanjarin fate or whatever really, ascertain their own eyes.

name: A Husk at Dusk
summary:
A Husk At Dusk invites you to step into Stanley the Scarecrow's magical corn maze. You'll be met with puzzles and challenges along the way in this autumn themed adventure. For those who complete Stan's maze there is a ... great reward waiting.

This is Lump Hammer Games' first release and we hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it! We dedicate this game to the memory of Stanley Bell (1948-2011) who loved video games, corny jokes and a good maze.

name: A House for Alesa
summary: When Alesa was 6 years old, she had a terrifying encounter with a man called "Mr. Bob." She barely managed to escape from him and the experience has haunted her ever since...18 years later, Alesa, who became a social worker, has been sent to investigate a quite mysterious family living in a very unsettling house. What seemed like a simple task, might turn out to be the most horrifying day of her life...

name: A Haunted House
summary: A Haunted House is a game inspired by classic survival horror. You play as paranormal investigator Eerie Grey who has been summoned to a remote house under suspicious circumstances.

name: A House for Alesa 2
summary: One year after the events of A House for Alesa (note: canon ending is ending F having kept your tongue intact), Alesa receives a call from a detective who confirms her worst fear: Mr. Bob and his family are back and they are coming for her. Will Alesa survive the night? How many more horrors must she endure? Is there another house of horrors waiting for her?

name: A Hunter's Tale
summary: Explore Fuji's mysteries in this VR RPG adventure. Battle massive beasts, conquer challenges, and grow stronger with each encounter.

name: A House for Alesa 3
summary: One year after the events of A House for Alesa 2, Alesa and Greta decide to move away from the city and buy a house in a nice small rural town. However, unbeknownst to them, something wicked is taking place in the town. Now, the worst nightmare imaginable is about to begin...

name: A House 4 Alesa
summary:
Rpg Maker horror about a social worker trapped in a house of horrors.
4th game in the series (excluding the remake) and direct sequel to A House for Alesa 3

name: A Human Haunting!
summary: A hidden object game where a ghost looks for signs of a human haunting!

name: A Horror Game for Cowards
summary: It's a short horror game designed for those who are too scared to play horror games and for horror lovers looking for different experiences. The game features cartoon-style graphics, a narrator and popular horror elements in a safe experience. It also includes Easter eggs and 2 different endings.

name: A House in the Rift
summary: A HOUSE IN THE RIFT is a sandbox harem game with monthly updates. It’s densely packed and easy to navigate.

name: A Helping Hand
summary:
King Boo has returned to force Mario players to socialize. Players must work together through shadows, riddles, and schemes to thwart his evil plans.

This QLDC Hackjam entry is designed to be played with a partner. You'll play together simultaneously, on different systems, with a way to communicate. The hack doesn't connect to the Internet. No special emulator is required.

name: A Hidden Mountain Factory
summary: A map by Grzegorz Werner that has you infiltrate a hidden mountain factory.

name: A Hell of a Bloody Dragon
summary:
In this Open World Horror Adventure FPS, You have been miraculously resurrected from the dead with a noble mission: to capture a magnificent dragon for the Red Lord, who believes that this act will bring happiness to his kingdom.

Embark on a perilous journey and gather essential tools along the way to aid you in successfully capturing the dragon and ultimately bring joy to the heart of the Red Lord.

You will rediscover yourself and go through some horrific challenges before going home.

name: A Hunt for the Fae Folk
summary: While strolling about in the woods you've stumbled into another realm. It's denizens are mischievous and their pranks are plenty. You are tasked with finding 5 hidden Easter Eggs in order to regain your freedom.

name: A Happy New Year
summary:
A Happy New Year is a short text-based game where you spend New Year's Eve alone by the river. It's about getting messages from drunk people, about the need to justify what you're doing and maybe just about ordinary teenage-kitsch, too.

The game mixes personal experiences with fiction and would best be described as a mood-game. It's not necessarily about the story itself, but about a specific feeling at a specific time. It takes about 10 - 15 minutes to complete.

name: A House of Locked Secrets
summary: Step into the shoes of Bolen, a now-former thief living in the City. After some tumultuous events, you've been rethinking your path in life and your new road takes you high into the mountains, to the gates of a mysterious monastery. If you beat the mission, you can also get a coupon code for 50% of the companion novella, Shadowcursed

name: A Hole in my Room
summary: Explore a mysterious place and an atmospheric world filled with horrifying and unusual environments in this first-person psychological horror game. Find hidden objects, solve puzzles, hide from darkness, and enjoy a unique experience in the horror genre.

name: Ahapika: Heroic Agency
summary: Gather brave heroes and open the most heroic agency in Ancient Greece! Help people, argue with the gods, but remember: a mistake can be fatal.

name: Ah!Zombies HD
summary:
Ferocious as the earthquake, unstoppable as the deadly plague, inconceivable as aliens, they shatter the civilization and throughout our entire world in no time, here comes the No.1 destruction force: Zombies!

The story is about a bunch of heroes guarding a school bus to the security shelter in the zombie doomsday. The stunning visual effects and exciting gameplay will rock you to the max! Don’t lose your vigilance to those stupid looking zeds, prepare to say goodbye to this cruel world if you facing them without some badass gears.

name: A Handful of Lewd Games
summary: In A Handful of Lewd Games you'll compete in competitive masturbation, draw seedy art commissions to pay rent, and slap disembodied anime butts at the risk of being jumpscared!

name: Aha! Spot the Change Brain Teaser
summary: Can You Spot the Subtle Change in 20 Seconds? A Fun Brain-Training “Aha!” Puzzle Game

name: A House of Endless Windows
summary:
On August 19th, 1988, you marched from your grave to the front steps of what used to be your home.
On September 5th, 1988, you will leave our home again to die your second death.
A House of Endless Windows is a short visual novel made for Velox Fabula 2. Headphones recommended.

name: A Heavy Morning
summary: You know the feeling of struggling to get out of bed? In A Heavy Morning, you will play as a young girl battling with her own mind. Your only objective? Get out of bed and get to work on time.

name: Ahanar
summary: Ahanar is an interactive experience about a fictional (hopefully) town in Buryatia where all men were mobilized and none came back. Now Russia sends random men there and the women aren't having it. This is a 40-60 minute experience intended to play in one sitting. It is an anti-war project and as such deals with hard topics of oppression, racism, warmongering, power abuse, homophobia.

name: A Home Below
summary:
A Home Below is a single-player, story-driven exploration game where you play as a hermit crab exploring the ruins of a house that’s been lost to the sea.

Platform around large underwater rooms, drifting and floating your way further into the house, harnessing ocean currents and hitching lifts, climbing over surfaces and through cracks in the walls as you travel from room to room.

As a hermit crab with the ability to change shells, putting on the Salt family’s forgotten possessions allows you to see memories from the past, revealing the ghostly traces of the lives that once filled the house. Physically platform across these tableaus, providing new pathways and access to other rooms in the house.

Discover a wonderful world of responsive, characterful sea creatures based on real UK species, from skittish sea urchins and friendly anemones to a scary wrasse and a curious octopus. Add to your bestiary as you explore, learning real facts about sea life and forming powerful connections.

name: A Happy Summer of Loving You
summary: This is a summer love comedy about two new lovers who are a little bashful, but have a lot of fun.

name: A Haunting Novel: Surfaced Secrets - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you unearth sunken secrets and save your son in time?

name: A Hundred Years of Love and Death
summary: RPG with intergenerational respawn mechanic: If you die you continue to play as one of your children. The gameplay is focused on dating and stealth.

name: A Haunting Novel: Burton Hotel - Collector's Edition
summary: One way or another, the past always comes back.

name: A Handful of Dust
summary: Uncover a kingdom’s dark secrets in this 2D action-adventure Metroidvania. Explore a haunting world of ruins and shadow, master fluid, brutal combat, and unlock powerful abilities to overcome deadly enemies. Forge your path and choose your destiny in an ancient land balanced on the brink of ruin.

name: A Home Is Safe
summary: A Home Is Safe is a 3D survival horror game where a retro firmware update is your only hope of stopping T.O.M, home security robot turned killer. Split your focus between a tense computer interface and nerve-wracking first-person survival, rebuilding T.O.M.'s psyche as you evade the imposing threat.

name: A House Made of Sweets
summary: You play as a slightly naive young lady named Maliya, who traverses the forest behind her home to find her missing dog. Deep within said forest, she meets a strange blonde witch — living in a magical home made entirely out of candy.
